trans-unit.source: Maintaining a web server is really quite easy.

seg-source.mrk: Maintaining a web server is really quite easy.

target.mrk: Maintaining a web server is really quite easy.

trans-unit.source: If the web server crashes, restart it.

seg-source.mrk: If the web server crashes, restart it.

target.mrk: If the web server crashes, restart it.

trans-unit.source: Limit the number of connections to your server.

seg-source.mrk: Limit the number of connections to your server.

target.mrk: Limit the number of connections to your server.

trans-unit.source: This will make it run faster.

seg-source.mrk: This will make it run faster.

target.mrk: This will make it run faster.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you do not put confidential material on your server.

seg-source.mrk: Make sure you do not put confidential material on your server.

target.mrk: Make sure you do not put confidential material on your server.

trans-unit.source: It should be kept in a separate folder named "Private."

seg-source.mrk: It should be kept in a separate folder named "Private."

target.mrk: It should be kept in a separate folder named "Private."
